title: Shiseido Beauty Cake
medium: Photo offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: On a white ground, tiny images of sunbathers, in different positions and placed close together to resemble a crowded beach. Lower center, a compact whose lid is decorated with six concentric circles of melon, bright orange, and mint green surrounding a royal blue sun at center.  In lower right quadrant, a white arrow in perspective superimposed on bathers and pointing to the compact.  Inside the arrow, a series of Japanese characters in black.
name: Poster
